name: Platformer Toolkit Game
description:
The Game

I created this Game for my 2D Platformer Toolkit. You can use the toolkit, as well as the assets to create your own games.

 You can get the assetpack here

Controls

Movement - WASD / Arrow Keys

Jump - Space / Up / W

Smash Down - Down / S

Back to Menu - Escape

Fullscreen - F11

Fonts

[ codeman38 | cody@zone38.net | http://www.zone38.net/ ]
